name: red_rooster
text: if i'm ever mayor or some shit, i'm totally going to name a street "Thermometer Lane"

name: agika
text: Thermometer Lane defitely made this comic a five for me.

name: evolume
text: me too!

name: berami
text: I think Ray thought it was pretty clever too, so he couldn't resist using it twice.  I can totally see him taking pride in something like that.

name: petro
text: Those who grow up on Thermometer Lane will have the best porn names ever!

name: jrpigman
text: Only if their first pet was a Sulcata Tortoise named "Rectal."

name: evolume
text: or just "Rex."

name: ted0phile
text: Man what the hell kind of porn star name is 'Rectal Thermometer'

name: invidious
text: I dunno, a gay porn star name?

name: belgand
text: Not as good as Rex L. Thermometer.

name: lexsenthur
text: Wrecks Thermometer.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: A gay muppet porn star?

name: wae
text: "Buster Thermometer Lane" or just "Buster Thermometer"?

name: woodenteeth
text: Good if you had a hairless cat called "Fleshy".

name: snowman
text: mayors name streets

name: chester_fame
text: Thermometer Lane crosses Enema Terrace near Proctology Plaza.

name: catachresis
text: Just look at his little eyes. His eyes make it.

name: chaesar
text: The device to discover Puberty is called "I hate you dad"

name: soticoto
text: Or uncle... in this case?

name: jujubeesforjesus
text: The look on his face in panel 6 can only be accompanied by a frightened scrambling grab for his junk.  Just to make sure its all ok.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Ray thinks it is awesome to know if his nephew is in puberty.

name: zaratustra
text: Little Nephew, on the other hand, is terrified of the idea.

name: tenshanhan
text: I like how he says "If he is In Puberty". Like, "If he is In Heat" or, "If he is In Labour".

name: echidnaboy
text: The capital P is crucial.

name: aliiis
text: oh necessarily

name: epicurus
text: Oh yes, it is KEY to this one for certain.

name: steerpike66
text: The look that those eyes convey is 'eep'

name: honesttom
text: The weird thing is, the only difference between those eyes and his regular eyes is the position of the pupils.

name: twohundredninety
text: Achewood's art is very economical, isn't it?

name: joestork
text:
This one's probably already been linked to, but I remember a discussion in some other comic where it was claimed that little nephew never looks straight ahead, and people were trying to find counterexamples.

Well this is one.

Man, that was super necessary...

name: mattylite
text: It is voodoo economics.  It is not trickle down economics.  I wish I knew more kinds of economics so I could say it was or wasn't them here.

name: nosearmy
text: this is a false idea.  voodoo implies a trickling action, a downward movement.  i will not use BBCode to point your way to the Tubes where this knowledge is dispensed.  I am not that sort.

name: mattylite
text: I'm the guy who doesn't know anything about economics.  You're chubbied for not being that sort.

name: belgand
text: I thought it was actually a wild eep. Puberty is not something to be taken lightly. Not by your uncle and not by Dr. Andretti. We need to be certain on this.

name: taiiga
text: a classic ray vs little nephew struggle, and as usual ray finds his way to the top, but in a classy, tough love sort of way. ray's a good uncle.

name: small
text: Little Nephew deserves that ish, he's been getting far to cocky lately

name: echidnaboy
text: The Puberty machine has soft rubber heads to stop the cold steel implements from coming into contact with the patient's tender, young loins. Dr Andretti added this feature after the prototype proved unpopular.

name: beansdooma
text: Last panel wins it.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: A comment left by cpnglxynchos was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by beansdooma, Vondicus, GMM, Ravigotte)

name: stormagnet
text: Are you, perhaps, in Puberty?

name: johnnyrocker
text: I know that Little Nephew has the exact same expression in every panel here, but for some reason he looks so fittingly horrified in panel 6.

name: snowman
text: I was thinking that too!

name: stereo
text: He is too shocked to roll his eyes at Ray.

name: ham_shoes
text: He is shuddering inside. And it's hilarious!

name: jamsok
text: Puberty is sometimes a bitch

name: charchar
text: No, it is a very special time in a young person's life when they become an adult and it is all very natural and beautiful.

name: woodenteeth
text: Oily hair, pimples, patchy pubic hair, I-can't-believe-it's-not-a-mostach mostach, and a voice that cracks. "Excuse me Miss can I be excused I think I'm coming down with the plague" (thanks Mr. Izzard).

name: boredom_man
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: boredom_man
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: i_love_kate
text: I seem to remember that ending well.

name: jamsok
text: I think I should be allowed to chubby myself if I agree with myself.

name: drago25
text: The strips with Ray & Little Nephew make me happy like sunshine

name: radarjammer
text: Nephew is NOT entertained by this joke.

name: dj_douche
text: the alt text makes this one. a machine to tell puberty from non-puberty is sorely lacking from the modern doctor's arsenal.

name: carlyle
text: The moral here is don't lie about chicken.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Chris Onstad is the least qualified person to teach us a lesson regarding lying about chicken (or recipes thereof).

name: newspaperdrone
text: But... tomorrow's recipe is still chicken. Isn't it?

name: scorpio_nadir
text: I'll cross that road when I come to it.

name: possums
text: I love how this was originally a ploy to get Charley to eat the chicken, but then Ray runs with it anyway.
